_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Paper Leaf
author: admin@hexonode.com
description: A highly optimized configuration for Purpur tailored for hexonode.com.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# shellcheck shell=dash

cd /mnt/server || exit

printf "Downloading Leaf 1.21.4 build 520\n"
curl -o server.jar "https://api.leafmc.one/v2/projects/leaf/versions/1.21.4/builds/520/downloads/leaf-1.21.4-520.jar"

printf "Downloading optimized configuration files\n"

if [ ! -d "config" ]; then
    mkdir config
fi

if [ ! -f "server.properties" ]; then
    curl -o server.properties https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/server.properties
fi

if [ ! -f "bukkit.yml" ]; then
    curl -o bukkit.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/bukkit.yml
fi

if [ ! -f "spigot.yml" ]; then
    curl -o spigot.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/spigot.yml
fi

if [ ! -f "config/paper-global.yml" ]; then
    curl -o paper-global.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/paper-global.yml
fi

if [ ! -f "config/paper-world-defaults.yml" ]; then
    curl -o paper-world-defaults.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/paper-world-defaults.yml
fi

if [ ! -f "pufferfish.yml" ]; then
    curl -o pufferfish.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/pufferfish.yml
fi

if [ ! -f "config/purpur.yml" ]; then
    curl -o purpur.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/akaboydeve/optimized-minecraft-egg/main/configs/purpur.yml
fi

variables.name: Server Jar
variables.description: The name given to the server jar file. This is not user viewable.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the paper release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.
